location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Henry Wood, Accountant General, Fort William

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding an extract of register of the bills of exchange drawn by Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald in Colonel Stannus's favour on the Supreme Government, on account of the Mission to Persia. The extract from the register is enclosed with the letter.
